description: In Chhindwara district, complete lockdown was announced for the next 7 days from 8 pm on Thursday. In Betul, Khargone, Katni and Ratlam, the restrictions will be from 6pm to 6am between April 9 and April 17.

title: Coronavirus India updates: Madhya Pradesh govt announces night curfew in urban areas

title: Chhattisgarh Naxal attack: Slain CRPF jawan's body reaches home in Tripura
description: The mortal remains of slain CRPF jawan Shambhu Roy reached his home state Tripura on April 6. Shambhu was killed in the fierce encounter with the Naxals in Chhattisgarh on April 3 along with 22 personnel. MP from West Tripura Pratima Bhowmick, MLA Dr. Dilip Das, CRPF IG (Tripura) Satpal Rawat among others paid tribute to martyred Shambhu Roy. After paying full gun honour salute by CRPF with barrels downward, the body of the martyr left for his ancestral house at Bhagyapur village in North Tripura district.

title: Tripura CM Biplab Deb, Who Was Spreading Fake News About Virus In 2020, Tests COVID Positive
description:
Tripura Chief Minister Biplab Deb, today, tested positive for COVID-19 and has self-isolated at home, he said in a tweet.
"I have been tested positive for Covid-19. I have isolated myself at home as per the advice of doctors. I request everyone to please follow all the covid appropriate behaviour and stay safe," he tweeted.

title: Polling for Tripura ADC underway amid tight security
description: Khumulwng (Tripura), Apr 06 (ANI): Adequate security arrangements have been made for elections to 30-member Tripura Tribal Areas Autonomous District Council (TTAADC) which is underway in Tripura. A total of 157 candidates are in the fray for the autonomous council elections -14 from the BJP, 28 from the Left Front, 28 from the Congress, 17 from the Indigenous People's Front of Tripura (IPFT), and four from the Indigenous Nationalist Party of Twipra (INPT).A total of 8,65,041 voters, including 4,36,548 males and 4,28,490 females, are eligible to cast their votes at 1,244 polling stations set up in 1,060 places across the tribal council areas.

title: Tripura: Press Council of India seeks response from govt over attack on journalists

title: Tripura Govt organises special COVID-19 vaccination drive for elderly
description: Tripura Government is organising a three-day vaccination drive for elderly citizens suffering from co-morbidity in the age group of 45 to 60 and above 60 years. The drive is being organized by the Health and Family Welfare department in collaboration with the National Health Mission (NHM) and National Tuberculosis Elimination Program at Indira Gandhi Memorial (IGM) hospital. During the program, Tripura Chief Minister Biplab Kumar Deb distributed symbolic certificates of COVID-19 vaccination.

title: 26 Tripura Health Workers Covid+, 11 Of Them Had Received Vaccine Shot
